verses.roman:
aṅge kāṅṭā lāgila, kichu nā jānila!
āste-vyaste govinda tāṅra pāchete dhāilā

synonyms: aṅge—on the body; kāṅṭā—thorns; lāgila—touched; kichu—anything; nā jānilā—did not perceive; āste-vyaste—very hastily; govinda—His personal servant; tāṅra—Him; pāchete—behind; dhāilā—ran.
translation: Govinda ran very quickly behind the Lord, who did not feel any pain from the pricking of the thorns.
